info.description: API for customer and merchant authentication in a multivendor platform
info.title: Multivendor API

get.description: Returns list of all supported banks with codes
Retrieves the user's active cart with items

post.description: Adds multiple items to the user's active cart in one request
Clears all items from the user's active cart
Adds a product (with optional variant) to user's active cart

get.description: Retrieves a specific cart item

put.description: Updates the quantity of a cart item

delete.description: Removes a cart item by ID

get.description: Retrieves all categories with parent information
Redirects to Google OAuth login page
Processes Google OAuth callback and returns JWT token
get.summary: Handle Google OAuth callback for customer

post.description: Authenticates a customer using email and password

get.description: Retrieves the customer's profile information

post.description: Creates a new customer account with email, name, password, and optional country
Resets the customer's password (unprotected; add verification in production)
Customer creates a dispute for an order

get.description: Retrieve a specific dispute by ID
Fetches the details and status of a submitted merchant application (e.g., 'pending', 'approved', 'rejected')
get.summary: Retrieve a merchant application by ID

post.description: Allows a prospective merchant to submit an application with personal, business, and address information

400.description: Invalid request body or malformed JSON

post.description: Authenticates a merchant using work email and password

get.description: Fetches the merchant account details for the authenticated user, if their application has been approved
Fetches paginated list of products for authenticated merchant

post.description: Creates a product with variants and media for authenticated merchant

put.description: Adjusts stock delta for a given inventory ID

delete.description: Soft-deletes a product by ID for authenticated merchant

put.description: Updates existing media for a product

get.description: Retrieves all orders and their items for the authenticated user

post.description: Converts user's active cart into an order

get.description: Retrieves a specific order with items

post.description: Starts Paystack checkout for an order

get.description: Verifies Paystack transaction by reference
Fetches paginated list of products, optionally filtered by category
Fetches a single product with media and variants
Retrieve reviews for a specific product
Retrieve all return requests for the authenticated customer

post.description: Customer creates a return request for an order item

get.description: Retrieve a specific return request by ID

post.description: Create a new review by user

get.description: Retrieve a review by its ID

put.description: Update an existing review by ID

delete.description: Remove all products from the user's wishlist

post.description: Add a product to the user's wishlist
post.summary: Add a product to the wishlist

delete.description: Remove a product from the user's wishlist
delete.summary: Remove a product from the wishlist

get.description: Check if a specific product is in the user's wishlist
get.summary: Check if a product is in the wishlist

get.description: Retrieve the user's wishlist

status.description: Consider using the models.OrderStatus type directly
